result.arabic_text: قَالُواْ فَأۡتُواْ بِهِۦ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِ ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَشۡهَدُونَ
result.translation: (61) They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people that they may testify."[892]
result.footnotes: [892]- To what they had heard him say.  It may also mean "...that they may witness [what will be done to him as punishment]."
